remarks: Property of the identity lattice translation.  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnnidn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnideq $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( F = ( _I |` B ) <-> ( F ` P ) = P ) ) $.
